title: She's Taken Care Of and I'm Not
itunes:title: She's Taken Care Of and I'm Not
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my girlfriend and I have been together for 4 years and we had a normal relationship, having great sex on the regular, until two weeks ago. She started tripping about us having sex and we’re not married, but she lives with me, which also goes against the Bible. We were conflicted about it, but she moved in anyway. After having sex with her for 4 years straight, I am doing my best to stop pressuring her for sex....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
